about_the_game:
This is a narrative game full of fantasy and inner exploration.

It tells the story of a person experiencing the blows and sorrows of the past,repeating monotonous days, and feeling the powerlessness of life.During this difficult moment, he met his best friend──Anyan. Anyan lives with him, sharing happiness and comforting each other. However, as time goes by, the protagonist gradually discovers that An Yan is just a figment of his imagination.After realizing this,Anyan no longer appears, but occasionally,he will still appear in the protagonist's mind and say something. Players will start from the perspective of the protagonist,explore his inner world, and uncover the secrets buried deep in his heart.
